title: How to Make Baked Fig Pudding

steps.headline: Beat butter or margarine until soft.
Add eggs and molasses and beat until fluffy.
steps.description: Add figs, lemon rind, and buttermilk.

steps.headline: Sift together flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Stir the sifted ingredients into the pudding mixture.
Bake in the greased tube pan for 60 minutes.

text: Preheat the oven to 325 °F (163 °C).  Beat butter or margarine until soft.  Add eggs and molasses and beat until fluffy. Add figs, lemon rind, and buttermilk. Sift together flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg.  Stir the sifted ingredients into the pudding mixture.  Bake in the greased tube pan for 60 minutes.  Finished.
